pages.text: The infused variant of the $(l:materials/lava_crystal)Lava Crystal$() is obtained by throwing the regular variants into lava.$(br)The crystals are used to craft the $(l:armors/infused_lava_armor)infused lava armor$(), $(l:tools/infused_lava_tools)infused lava tools$() as well as the $(l:weapons/infused_lava_weapons)infused lava weapons$().
